paragraphs.text: The Complete Book 2 Collection's cover features Aang in the Avatar State in the background, hovering over the other members of Team Avatar.

paragraphs.body: Book Two: Earth (土) is the title of the second season of ${link_0}, created by ${link_1} and ${link_2}, and the sequel to ${link_3}. The title refers to the ${link_4}: water, earth, fire, and air, and the story of ${link_5} learning ${link_6} under the tutelage of ${link_7} is a primary focus during this season.
paragraphs.text: Book Two: Earth (土) is the title of the second season of Avatar: The Last Airbender, created by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko, and the sequel to Book One: Water. The title refers to the Avatar Cycle: water, earth, fire, and air, and the story of Aang learning earthbending under the tutelage of Toph Beifong is a primary focus during this season.

paragraphs.body: The season began on March 17, 2006, with the airing of "${link_0}", and ended on December 1 of the same year with "${link_1}" and "${link_2}", both episodes airing on the same date. It was followed by ${link_3}, the third and final season.
paragraphs.text: The season began on March 17, 2006, with the airing of "The Avatar State", and ended on December 1 of the same year with "The Guru" and "The Crossroads of Destiny", both episodes airing on the same date. It was followed by Book Three: Fire, the third and final season.

paragraphs.body: In the iTunes release of Book Two, the episodes "${link_0}" and "${link_1}" are combined into one episode titled "The Secret of the Fire Nation".
paragraphs.text: In the iTunes release of Book Two, the episodes "The Serpent's Pass" and "The Drill" are combined into one episode titled "The Secret of the Fire Nation".

paragraphs.body: The episodes were released on four DVDs (five episodes to a DVD) and later as a box set containing all twenty episodes of the season. The DVDs were released throughout the year 2007.
